product_name: Pace Cinelli Winged C Bike Cap - Men's
long_description: Express your enthusiasm for Italian racing with the Cinelli Winged C Bike Cap from Pace. Cotton cap features the iconic winged C logo of Italy's internationally renowned Cinelli racing bike company. Visor helps keep sun and glare out of your eyes when you're off the bike cheering at the races.
short_description: Express your enthusiasm for Italian racing with the Cinelli Winged C Bike Cap from Pace.
